title: Philosophical Guidelines for Module Design
description: Engineering boundaries and epistemic safeguards in the Aureus Engine.

contents.rule_isolation: Do not embed shaping constraints into logic modules; isolate in rules.py.
contents.heuristic_separation: Heuristics and formal rules must remain separate; adjustment_layer.py may bridge behaviorally.
contents.data_vs_doctrine: Never confuse data-derived behavior with intended mechanical doctrine. Preserve both lanes.
contents.expansion_flexibility: Design modules to allow for future user interface layers and feedback systems without entangling core logic.
